metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1345 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
The bmexec_trans function in kwset.c in grep 2.19 through 2.21 allows local users to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds heap read and crash) via crafted input when using the -F option.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1345` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

grep - 2.16-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: grep package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.16-1').
